channel.title: Need help on making 100%glory
channel.description: i got the tele places done all i need is that it degrates and doesnt let you tele when its at 0

item.title: Need help on making 100%glory
item.dc:creator: @runescapeddsk0 runescapeddsk0
item.description:
@runescapeddsk0 wrote:

ok then after that i make one for glory(3)that makes it into glory (2) then when i get to normal glory how can i make it not tele anymore?

Read full topic

item.title: Need help on making 100%glory
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

Easy ;).

Just like a potion, you drink it the doses go down right? So search for your cases and try to mimic that case but just replace it with the glory codes. Here…let me get it, Hold on.

case 1712: // Glory (4) setAnimation(714); deleteItem(1712, GetItemSlot(1712), 1); addItem(1710, 1); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; GoOn = false; break;

Hopefully that will work (That’s only part of the code) I quickly fixed it up. Try adding the rest your self, also put that with the other cases.

Read full topic
